long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ClipType is a Chrome extension designed to bypass anti-paste systems by simulating human typing. It reads text directly from your clipboard and automatically types it into any text field, mimicking natural typing patterns. Perfect for sites that block copy-pasting, ClipType saves you time and effort while ensuring a smooth and seamless experience.
